menuItems.name: Classic Eggs Benedict
menuItems.description: Poached eggs on English muffins with Canadian bacon and hollandaise sauce.

menuItems.name: Belgian Waffle
menuItems.description: Fluffy Belgian waffle topped with fresh berries and maple syrup.

menuItems.name: Avocado Toast
menuItems.description: Sourdough toast topped with smashed avocado, cherry tomatoes, and microgreens.

menuItems.name: Breakfast Burrito
menuItems.description: Scrambled eggs, black beans, chorizo, and cheese wrapped in a flour tortilla.

menuItems.name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
menuItems.description: Layers of Greek yogurt, granola, and seasonal fruits.

menuItems.name: Cappuccino
menuItems.description: Perfectly balanced espresso with steamed milk and a layer of foam.

menuItems.name: Iced Vanilla Latte
menuItems.description: Espresso chilled with milk and a hint of vanilla syrup over ice.

menuItems.name: Fresh Orange Juice
menuItems.description: Freshly squeezed orange juice, served chilled.

menuItems.name: Matcha Green Tea Latte
menuItems.description: Ceremonial grade matcha whisked with steamed milk.

menuItems.name: Hot Chocolate
menuItems.description: Rich, creamy hot chocolate topped with whipped cream.

menuItems.name: Breakfast Panini
menuItems.description: Pressed sandwich with egg, bacon, cheddar, and spinach on ciabatta.

menuItems.name: Cold Brew
menuItems.description: Smooth cold brew coffee steeped for 18 hours, served black or with cream.
